remarks: A compactly generated space is a topology.  (Note: henceforth we will use the idiom " ` J e. ran kGen ` " to denote " ` J ` is compactly generated", since as we will show a space is compactly generated iff it is in the range of the compact generator.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement: kgentop $p |- ( J e. ran kGen -> J e. Top ) $.
